name: Delicious Sushi
description:
Delicious Sushi!

Keyboard Controls:
WASD or Arrow Keys to Move
Shift to Boost
Esc to Return to Main Menu
P to Pause/Unpause

XBox 360 Controls:
Left Joystick to Move
X to Boost
Select/Back to Return to Main Menu
Start to Pause/Unpause

Run around and collect the little sushi to get points, but avoid the rolling bombs because they don't taste good. As you collect sushi you get fatter, and you also get more points the bigger you are. Different sushi also give different bonuses, experiment to see which are the tastiest!

Have fun! :D
